content: This PR by a new contributor is awaiting review for 49 days now: let's find somebody to take a look. I'm not sure who would be a good reviewer for this material - can you, @Kim Morrison (as a maintainer with algebra expertise), perhaps suggest somebody else to ask? Thanks!
(Thanks @Yaël Dillies for reviewing. This is back to awaiting-CI now.)
Oh! I hadn't even seen this thread
